oai_dc:dc.dc:title: ComLinToo: The Computational Linguistics Toolset
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The Computational Linguistics Toolset is a set of tools for computational linguistics. It contains re-usable code for cleaning, splitting, refining, and taking samples from corpora (ICE, Penn, and a native one), for tagging them using the TnT-tagger, for doing permutation statistics on N-grams (useful for finding statistically significant syntactical differences between any two sets of tagged texts), and various examination-tools. The tools themselves are well documented
